channel.title: Jupyter on Kip Jiang
channel.description: Recent content in Jupyter on Kip Jiang

item.title: Jupyter Notebook on Remote Server
item.description: Install miniconda 参考 Working With Ubuntu (2) Configure Jypyter Note: 通过 ssh 远程链接到服务器操作。 安装 jupyter notebook $ conda install jupyter notebook 生成配置文件 $ jupyter notebook --generate-config Writing default config to: /home/rainer/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py 通过 ipython 生成密码的 Hash $ ipython Python 3.6.9 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Mar 31 2020, 19:07:31) Type 'copyright', 'credits' or 'license' for more information IPython 7.7.0 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. Type '?
